subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In his second N.H.L. season, the 6-foot-4, 204-pound Eric Staal is one of the major reasons the Hurricanes lead the Devils, 2-0, in their best-of-seven Eastern Conference semifinal series.
snippet: In his second N.H.L. season, the 6-foot-4, 204-pound Eric Staal is one of the major reasons the Hurricanes lead the Devils, 2-0, in their best-of-seven Eastern Conference semifinal series.
